metadata.criteria: Settlements with claim deadlines within 90 days from scan date (by April 8, 2026)

settlements.name: Papaya Gaming - Bots Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Had a Papaya Gaming account and made a deposit in one or more Papaya games between January 1, 2019 and September 5, 2024

settlements.name: Mid America Pet Food - Salmonella Contamination Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Bought certain pet foods produced by Mid America Pet Food between October 31, 2022 and February 29, 2024

settlements.name: 23andMe - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: https://23andmedatasettlement.com/
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Were a 23andMe customer between May 1, 2023 and October 1, 2023 and received notice that personal information was compromised in a data breach. Up to $10,000 for Extraordinary Claims; Up to $165 for Health Information Claims; An estimated $100 for Statutory Cash Claims; and 5 years of Privacy & Medical Shield + Genetic Monitoring

settlements.name: Fathom Realty - Unwanted Texts Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received texts from or on behalf of Fathom's former real estate agent, Marcus Edwards, between August 15, 2021 and December 15, 2024 when your number was on the National Do Not Call Registry

settlements.name: Nations Direct Mortgage - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Private information was compromised in the December 2023 Nations Direct Mortgage data breach

settlements.name: Oklahoma Spine Hospital - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received a notice stating that personal information was exposed in a July 2024 Oklahoma Spine Hospital data breach

settlements.name: Redeemer Health - Data Privacy Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Were a patient of Redeemer Health between January 1, 2019 and March 21, 2023 and used Redeemer's website during that time

settlements.name: Restek Corporation - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was exposed in the June 2023 Restek Corporation data breach

settlements.name: Wells Fargo COVID Forbearance Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Were provided a mortgage forbearance by Wells Fargo during the COVID-19 pandemic without informed consent

settlements.name: Behavioral Health Resources - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received notice of the November 2024 Behavioral Health Resources data breach

settlements.name: Dakota Eye Institute - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was exposed in a Dakota Eye Institute data breach discovered in October 2023

settlements.name: Liberty Hospital - Data Breach Class Action Settlement

settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was affected by the December 2023 Liberty Hospital data breach

settlements.name: Multnomah County - Property Foreclosures Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: https://www.MultnomahTaxForeclosureSettlement.com
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Held or are the heir and successor to a person or entity who held an ownership interest in property that was foreclosed on and sold in Multnomah County between October 12, 2017 and June 25, 2025

settlements.name: Planned Parenthood of Montana - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received notice that private information may have been compromised in a Planned Parenthood of Montana data breach, which took place in August 2024

settlements.name: City of Hope National Medical Center - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received notice of a data breach affecting City of Hope National Medical Center that was discovered in October 2023. California residents may receive $250 statutory payment

settlements.name: Toyota Hands-Free Echo Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: https://www.toyotaechosettlement.com/
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Owned, bought or leased certain 2014-2019 Toyota vehicles in certain states (Arizona, California, Colorado, Georgia, Illinois, Minnesota, Missouri, New York, Ohio, Oregon, and Washington)
settlements.note: No monetary compensation - outreach program only

settlements.name: AirportParking.com - Booking Fees (California) Class Action Settlement
settlements.direct_settlement_url: Visit Official Settlement Website (link from classaction.org)
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Made a booking on AirportParkingReservations.com or AirportParking.com between July 1, 2024 and March 10, 2025 as a California resident and paid a mandatory service charge
